attributes.action: Help us to keep the kids toys in the garden at Godfrey walk
attributes.additional_details: The council is trying to take the kids toys away from the communal garden so the kids cannot play
attributes.background: We would like help to keep the kids toys in the communal garden at Godfrey walk so they kids can play and enjoy the garden

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
